comments.body:
Due to diff exception handling for IllegalArgumentException at the call sides, the results are not same https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/28592/files#diff-79dd276be45ede6f34e24ad7005b0a7cR801-R806
cc @cloud-fan
it's OK. it's already the case in 2.4

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +922,926 @@
-- !query
select from_unixtime(54321, 'QQQQQ')
-- !query schema
struct<from_unixtime(CAST(54321 AS BIGINT), QQQQQ):string>

comments.body: can we test the optional case? `to_timestamp('2019-10-06 10:11:12', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss[.SSSSSS]')`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +491,495 @@
-- !query
select to_timestamp('2019-10-06 10:11:12.123', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss[.SSSSSS]')
-- !query schema
struct<to_timestamp('2019-10-06 10:11:12.123', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss[.SSSSSS]'):timestamp>

comments.body: can we avoid adding cast if not necessary?
OK it's the existing behavior too, we can revisit it later.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +119,123 @@select timestamp'2011-11-11 11:11:11' + interval '2' day
-- !query 13 schema
struct<CAST(TIMESTAMP '2011-11-11 11:11:11' + INTERVAL '2 days' AS TIMESTAMP):timestamp>
-- !query 13 output
2011-11-13 11:11:11

comments.body: it's super weird that this returns string. What was the behavior before?
OK it's the existing behavior. We can revisit it later.
yea, but follows the behavior before https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/26412/files/c84d46ea6d384dcb1f442ca54abad48e59c92bb3#diff-383a8cdd0a9c58cae68e0a79295520a3L846

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +151,155 @@select '2011-11-11' - interval '2' day
-- !query 17 schema
struct<CAST(CAST(2011-11-11 AS TIMESTAMP) - INTERVAL '2 days' AS STRING):string>
-- !query 17 output
2011-11-09 00:00:00
